content: crochet marble scarf - this scarf is one any level of crocheter can make it is quick and easy to crochet on a 5 50mm hook the patterns instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 ** finished size approx - 6 x 53 inches excluding pom poms level intermediate copyright ©2020 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-marble-scarf/
